title: yns22
author: yns22
created_time: November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMLast edit: November 13, 2023, 07:29:23 PM by yns22
content: Hi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjack

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: Quote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackWhat is the guarantee that this is not a malware you are telling us to download. Many have done this but it was obvious that nobody replied to their post of downloading it but was back-lashed for bringing such here and i hope you too you would not face any difficulty here for doing this. By  the way you did not make any clear illustration abut your app for a better understanding which could have helped for a better understanding and looking at the fact that your account is a new account, people would be scared of attempting to download due to their past experience.

There are those that might take a chance but hopefully they run a scan before doing anything.

Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackyou have just ask us to visit first and study before asking to download because that sense you made us all having multiple thoughts to believe you.not to mention that obvious reason being a New created account that sharing link and asking people to download directly.and if you are posting this as your Announcement Thread then you gain nothing but suspicion .Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 14, 2023, 04:45:44 AM100% correct, my rule is just do not click or download anything unless I know the person or site and everyone else should follow the same rule. There are those that might take a chance but hopefully they run a scan before doing anything.same with me , Never that i even clicked a link that delivered and shared by newbie account unless being checked by other senior account that knows how to evaluate legit and BS links .

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Op if you want to promote your product then you need to make an detailed ANN thread like thesejust posting a link here and telling people to download a app will not going to work, No one will trust you and your product.I think someone has built an app and paid OP to promote it anywhere because it is new and want some downloads to grow.

comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 14, 2023, 04:45:44 AMQuote from: Broadanbig on November 13, 2023, 10:31:47 PMQuote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. There are those that might take a chance but hopefully they run a scan before doing anything.Well it looks like the app is on the google play store. I doubt they would allow someone to use their platform as a malware distribution service. OP should have presented his app after gaining some initial trust in the community. Perhaps by sharing some content or something like that.He seems not to notice that he is presenting the app in a sketchy way due to lack of information and lazy introduction, which to many people here is a red flag. But then again, we might have become over-paranoid of scammers in the last years. But then again, one can never be too careful. Better safe than sorry.

But then again, we might have become over-paranoid of scammers in the last years. But then again, one can never be too careful. Better safe than sorry.There is a only 500+ downloads of this app and there is no trust rating so far. The app contains ads and we never know if there is any malware programmed in the app. If it was published on iOS then we could have trusted it but anyone can put up the app on google play store without any scrutiny.As a method of precaution, i would advise not to download this app unless we see some really good feedback about it.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on November 14, 2023, 03:17:09 PMThere is a only 500+ downloads of this app and there is no trust rating so far. The app contains ads and we never know if there is any malware programmed in the app. If it was published on iOS then we could have trusted it but anyone can put up the app on google play store without any scrutiny.As a method of precaution, i would advise not to download this app unless we see some really good feedback about it.I saw some stuff online lately about fake wallet apps popping up in the App Store for iOS.  So I guess it's not totally impossible for malware to make its way onto iOS too.  And yeah, just 'cause an app is in the official Google Play store for Android doesn't automatically make it safe. I agree that one should be careful, and better wait for some verified reviews.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: The Google Play page doesn't say users can bet BTC. Agree that it needs an ANN thread.But if it is then this is one of the casino app that actually launched a casino app that we can use Crypto. There are only a few of them. The only problem with this is that OP is very new to this forum and god knows what's in it. Like what is said above, downloading something we are unsure of whether there are malware in it can hack out mobile wallets.

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: Quote from: noormcs5 on November 14, 2023, 03:17:09 PMThere is a only 500+ downloads of this app and there is no trust rating so far. The app contains ads and we never know if there is any malware programmed in the app. If it was published on iOS then we could have trusted it but anyone can put up the app on google play store without any scrutiny.Yep, looks like the project is new, i just saw on Googleplay they have a site, but they don't give any information about the company.blackjack21sidebets.comAnd when you look at the creation date we can see it was created in "2023-10-30T13:40:24Z", less than 15 days.So, let's hope the project isn't a hit-and-run move, personally, i will wait some time and read the reviews in trust pilot, after that, I will take the decision to try it or not.

comments.author: Dunamisx
comments.body: OP am sorry this is not how you would have started in other to get your service trusted if at all you're not having any issue with the whole thing your offering, you can't be new here and offer a download link and expected us to follow like that without going through the normal procedures to verify what you're giving, for the fact that we want a better gambling experience doesn't mean we shouldn't get vigilant on any chances we could get scammed.

I was curios if the app has any affiliation with the mainstream blackjack casino which OP should have let us know otherwise I would have no option than to see it as a possible hit and run.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Lol, and just like that, the OP didn't get back in the community to answer all our concerns.And with that, and just like the majority here, I wouldn't download anything that is new. As for the side bet on BlackJack or for Baccarat for that matter, it's easy to learn though. Specially if you are really keen on this games, no need to download any suspicious apps or what not.Just go with the old and traditional way, read and learn and then practice it in the casino itself. You can even ask the dealer on how everything is and for sure they are all going to help anyone to play and get hook on this card games.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Quote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackClosed source program, not saying that it could have malware or what, but being a newbie and then presenting something like this, which doesn't look professional, we have to question what this app is all about, otherwise we won't simply download it and try.As we all know that this market that we live it, there are are a lot of ways to lose our crypto thru downloading softwares that might have a malware on it. With that we won't simply trust anyone here asking us specially a newbie to try his app for gambling. Sorry to burst the bubble to the OP.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackI have never tried or experienced downloading a casino on my mobile device because, as far as I know, the risk is quite high.I am more comfortable gambling on crypto on the casino website itself, not on those that are only downloaded from the Google Play Store.Because almost most of the casinos that have had issues have always come from downloadable casino apps on mobile devices promoted by social media influencers,

comments.author: junder
comments.body: Quote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackIt's not that I'm not interested, but we can still find Blackjack games safely without needing to download an application. Even though it's in the Playstore, it doesn't rule out the possibility that there is malware trying to exploit cellphone data. So anyone needs to be careful, especially beginners, and always have safer alternative options. The casino already provides Blackjack games and we only need to go there without the hassle of downloading applications that fill up our cellphone memory.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Quote from: bettercrypto on November 15, 2023, 01:16:16 AMQuote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackI have never tried or experienced downloading a casino on my mobile device because, as far as I know, the risk is quite high.I am more comfortable gambling on crypto on the casino website itself, not on those that are only downloaded from the Google Play Store.Because almost most of the casinos that have had issues have always come from downloadable casino apps on mobile devices promoted by social media influencers,If the casino itself has its own game app in either the Play Store or App Store, one can still use it that way, or they also announce the official link to the casino app on their website, at least one can rest assured that it's their trusted casino app and not any clone has been added to the Play Store or anywhere one can download the application from. Using an app for betting that is mobile-friendly is one of the best, as it saves you the stress of logging in whenever you want to play a game, as the website can log you out depending on how secure the casino is. But for the one the OP dropped, one needs to be careful as you can't trust the source, and what is the limit to the capability of the app aside from deposit safety? What else will the app have access to on your device?

Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackI have never tried or experienced downloading a casino on my mobile device because, as far as I know, the risk is quite high.I am more comfortable gambling on crypto on the casino website itself, not on those that are only downloaded from the Google Play Store.Because almost most of the casinos that have had issues have always come from downloadable casino apps on mobile devices promoted by social media influencers,I myself have not done that before but rather visiting the website is the best option i take when ever i feel like but it is a no one for me downloading it now but possibly in the nearest  future, I think i would do that based on the reviews and feedback of other users in the course of using the casino app. When it comes to social media influencers promoting casinos on their handles, we already know why they are doing such and as a matter of fact,most of them have no knowledge or idea of the outlook of what they are promoting and do not care or bother doing their own diligence before taking on those advertorial agreement. What they are just after is their pocket and benefit they would derive while leaving their followers or fan base to deal with whatever would spring up as a result of their engagement with what they have promoted via their handle.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: yns22 on November 12, 2023, 11:24:41 PMHi folks. I published Blackjack 21 game with side bets and detailed analyses.I would be glad if you download and support. Thanks. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yns.blackjackCan you clarify what is this all about because as many user already pointed out, We can’t click it blindly since you are not trusted here although the source of the is play store . I have a blackjack app that I purchased premium to unlock all feature that I need to my counting card training. Is this app a casino that let you play blackjack with real money or just a simulation app for blackjack beginner since you mention about detailed analysis. I’m interested to this because of the sidebet feature which is commonly missing on the blackjack app. Please provide more info or some audit that will prove that the app is malware free.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on November 14, 2023, 04:45:44 AM100% correct, my rule is just do not click or download anything unless I know the person or site and everyone else should follow the same rule. There are those that might take a chance but hopefully they run a scan before doing anything.I had to deactivate my auto download on my telegram, the easiest way to hack into people's devices is via downloads and phishing links. I don't welcome them in my devices, whatever attachments are associated with any email, I ensure I get clarification from the sender by checking the senders address before I download it. Too much for downloading files these days
